title: Fig and almond pancakes
ingredients: ['180ml milk', '2 tablespoons vinegar', '125g plain flour', '2 tablespoons caster sugar', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1 egg', '30g butter, melted', 'oil', '4 tablespoons chopped dried figs', '5 tablespoons flaked almonds, toasted']
